title: Filtr podle názvu přílohy
content: Mohu filtrovat zprávy podle názvu přílohy? Momentálně lze rozlišit pouze na má přílohu/nemá přílohu. Ze stejné adresy mi přicházejí 2 různé typy pdf souborů, jenž se liší částí svého názvu.

content:

title: lento ad avviarsi
content: uso Thanderbird da anni su mac con Sierra ed è sempre stato efficiente. Da alcuni giorni noto che per ripartire dopo una chiusura ci mette circa 5 minuti con la rotellina che gira e il video bloccato sulla vista della posta ricevuta. (vedi immagine) Sicuramente ha archivi pieni con parecchi giga ma prima non dava questo problema. Qualcuno ha suggerimenti ( versione 115.18.0 (64 bit))

title: reading old emails
content: I am using Thunderbird as an email server. From time to time I navigate to the 'roaming' folder and save the 'Thunderbird' folder as a backup. I could then rename the old back-up file to 'Thunderbird' and read the old emails. That has always worked in the past, but since I have had to change email platform that doesn't seem to work any more. So how can I set thunderbird to view these old emails?
creator: dave68

title: Email
content:
Hello sfhowes,

Thank you for your response and I tried to follow your instructions. In one of the two accounts, I couldn't change POP mail server to IMAP mail server. I changed the Port to 993 but I couldn't change the Default to 993. Also, the outgoing SMTP server only appeared in the Default account, and not the other. I tried sending emails to both accounts, but the emails only appeared in the Sent folders and not the Inbox folders. The funny thing is that the emails appeared in the Inbox on my other computer! Will you be able to make the changes on this computer from your end? Once again, thank you so much for your help, and I look forward to hearing from you. Best regards, Sheila Herman
creator: swherman

title: Xfinity Email
content: Problems with connection to Xfinity email. Will not connect when using the windows desktop version. I have no problems (currently) with the mobile version. both have the same setting but for some reason the Desktop version will not accept the password provided. Cleared the cache on the desktop and still no connection to xfinity. connection stopped 6/2/2025 around noon eastern time US. Any suggestions?
creator: sni731

title: TB 139.01 Stop the Blue Dots
content:
Hello,

I run TB 139.01 under Windows 11/64...

About a week ago, I started to see "Blue Dots" appearing to the left of each paragraph in my messages. In the hope of removing those dots, I've tried all of the suggestions I can find, but they still appear.

Might you suggest a method that will prevent the dreaded Blue Dots from appearing?

Sincere thanks, Lothar

(P.S. I have a large mallet at the ready...)
creator: lotharkrepke

title: Can't delete one specific email
content:
My antivirus (BitDefender) quarantined an attachment on a email I recently received and now the Thunderbird app won't let me do anything with said email.

I have tried restoring the file through the antivirus to no avail. The only thing I can do is assign a tag to the email in question, as the program won't even let me open it.

The mail address in question uses POP3.

Does anyone know how to fix this?
creator: mario_pirovano

title: Filter Issues and Order of Threaded e-Mails
content:
I'm having an issue with some of my filters not working. I've checked the several times and they should be set up correctly, but, for some reason, they don't perform their respective actions, even when I press "Run Now".

Also: I recently changed the sorting of my e-mails to be threaded by chain. I like to have all of my most recent e-mails show up at the top, but, within each thread, the most recent e-mail shows at the bottom (see the supposedly-attached image). Is there a way to flip this?

Thank you in advance.
creator: ezequielm

title: Order of Threaded e-Mails
content:
I recently changed the sorting of my e-mails to be threaded by chain. I like to have all of my most recent e-mails show up at the top, but, within each thread, the most recent e-mail shows at the bottom (see the supposedly-attached image). Is there a way to flip this?

Thank you in advance.
creator: ezequielm

title: Deleted Trash emails still in "All Mail"
content: After deleting an email (GMAIL) from any folder and emptying Trash, the email is still in "All Mail". Deleting from "All Mail" and emptying Trash still leaves the email in "All Mail" - in fact, selecting the email to be deleted in "All Mail" and then selecting "Delete" causes them to disappear and then reappear. This used to work correctly. Using !39.0.1 64 bit version. Note: I recently had to reinstall Thunderbird after a systems issue - causing me to reinstall Windows 11 and noticed the problem after that. It might be that the GMAIL "Trash" folder has been linked to "All Mail". I can delete the emails by signing on to GMAIL on the web and deleting them that way.
creator: bolzja

title: Thunderbird
